A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Grew up on star wars and have always been a fan. I have read the expanded universe and even the new updated one given to us by Disney. This story did not fit in with that universe. \nSome of the best scenes ever featured in a star wars film were featured in The Last Jedi\, but these scenes just did not make up for the very weak story writing.\nAll in all\, it was fun\, but probably my least favourite of the franchise.
